ygData.subject: Re: completly OOC
ygData.msgSnippet: I think its a nice idea and I m always willing to join another game. Thing is in what era would you set it? During megatrons rule? In which case megatron would

I think its a nice idea and I'm always willing to join another game. Thing =
is in what era would you set it? During megatrons rule? In which case megat=
ron would be harvesting ALL sparks ally and foe alike. Could always go with=
 the organic cybertron and we can all be those dancing shadows they called =
a cheering crowd in the show... :)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From:=
 David Torrey 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, August 17, 2000 =
8:04 PM
  Subject: completly OOC


  What would everybody think if I made a=
 Cybertron RPG? One that took place on Cybertron, but in the same universe =
as Neo Beast Wars? Would anybody join? And if I did, what would you think o=
f the name Neo Beast Machines? Just to keep a running theme.

-------------=
-----------------------------------------------------------------
